name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting
display_help: You have mastered the art of staff fighting, allowing you to strike at your foes in great sweeping arcs. Staff Fighting provides a good amount of control effects as well as some self buffs. Your melee attacks build stacks of Perfection of Body. Once you have three stacks of this power using Eye of the Storm or Sky Splitter will result in a more powerful effect and will consume all 3 stacks of Perfection of Body.

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Mercurial_Blow
powers.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. This power grants one stack of Perfection of Body. Damage: Light, Recharge: Very Fast

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Precise_Strike
powers.display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. This power grants one stack of Perfection of Body. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Guarded_Spin
powers.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal defense briefly. This power grants one stack of Perfection of Body. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 9 ft. radius 90° arc (5 targets max)

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Assassins_Staff
powers.display_help: A signature Stalker attack. This attack does superior smashing damage on its own as a frontal attack and cannot be interrupted. However, if it is executed while you are Hidden, this attack will do tremendous damage, as you waylay your unsuspecting foe. This attack may be interrupted if you move or are attacked while executing this power and are hidden. Using this power while not hidden has a chance to critically hit equal to 33.3% times the number of stacks of Assassin's Focus. This power grants one stack of Perfection of Body. Using Assassin's Strike when not hidden will remove all stacks of Assassin's Focus regardless if you critically hit or not. Damage: Special, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Placate
powers.display_help: Allows you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassin's Staff. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Eye_of_the_Storm
powers.display_help: With a lightning fast series of spins of your staff you strike at all nearby foes dealing moderate damage with a chance of knocking foes down. This power will build one stack of Perfection of Body if the user has two or less stacks, if the user has three stacks of Perfection of Body it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 stacks of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and reduce damage resistance slightly for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Consumes Perfection

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Serpents_Reach
powers.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal High Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. This power builds one level of Perfection of Body. Note that Serpent's Reach is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Stalker_Melee.Staff_Fighting.Sky_Splitter
powers.display_help: You leap into the air and hammer your foe with an overhead bash from your staff. Sky Splitter deals Extreme Smashing damage, will knock the target into the air and will briefly disorient your target. This power will build one stack of Perfection of Body if the user has two or less stacks, if the user has three stacks of Perfection of Body it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and grant the user a bonus to damage resistance a short time. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Foe Knock Up, Disorient, -Fly, Consumes Perfection
